metadata.dc:title: The role of the health industry in the development of materials for preventing accidents with biological risks
metadata.dc:description: This work reflects and takes a country such as the United States as a reference to emphasise the need for health professionals to adopt preventative measures to reduce the incidence of avoidable work accidents (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Quejido Alonso, Olga
